channel.title: Can't Explain Just Look Here
channel.description: Well.. I amde my max stats to 99 but now I can't weild a white phat it says I need 120 defence. How do I change it so you need 99 defence?

item.title: Can't Explain Just Look Here
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

Open Client.Java
Ctrl+F public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {
Scroll Under Untill You See } else { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 120; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) { return 120; } } return 1; }
Or Something Similar To That.
In Here } else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) { return 120; }
Change The 120 To 99

Read full topic
